title: Tell me about a memorable photo you took.

korean: 작년 여름에 강릉 바다에서 찍은 일출 사진이 정말 기억에 남아요.
막상 바다에 나가서 해 뜨는 걸 보니까 정말 장관이더라고요.
하늘이 주황색, 분홍색으로 물들고, 바다에 빛이 반사되고 그랬어요.
그 순간을 놓치지 않으려고 연속으로 사진을 막 찍었어요.
나중에 보니까 그중에 정말 잘 나온 사진이 하나 있더라고요.
그 사진을 보면 그때의 감동이 다시 떠올라요.
친구들도 그 사진 너무 예쁘다고 해서 다같이 프로필 사진으로 썼어요.
지금도 그 사진은 제 휴대폰 배경화면이에요.
사진 한 장이 그때의 순간을 완벽하게 담아낸 것 같아요.
english: A sunrise photo I took at Gangneung beach last summer is really memorable.
I went on a 1-night 2-day trip to Gangneung with friends.
That day I woke up at 5 AM to see the sunrise.
Honestly, I was so sleepy and tired,
but when I actually went out to the sea and saw the sun rise, it was really spectacular.
The sky was dyed orange and pink, and light reflected on the sea.
I took photos continuously to not miss that moment.
Looking later, there was one photo among them that came out really well.
When I see that photo, the emotion from that time comes back to me.
Friends also said that photo was so pretty, so we all used it as our profile picture.
Even now, that photo is my phone wallpaper.
I think that one photo perfectly captured that moment.
